rules: Rule1: Either Food tests Technology, or Food tests Facility.
Rule2: Provided that Food tests Facility, the Organization does not use Technology.
Rule3: Under the condition that Technology tests Facility, if Food tests Technology, then the Organization uses Facility.
Rule4: Whenever Technology operates Facility, Food operates Facility.
Rule5: Under the condition that the Organization maintains Facility, Technology operates Facility.
Rule6: Whenever Technology upgrades Facility, then provided that Facility is reactivated, it must have been shut down.
Rule7: Either Technology upgrades Facility, or Technology repairs Facility.
Rule8: Under the condition that the Organization develops Technology, if the Organization is not profitable, then the Organization develops Food.
Rule9: Provided that Technology repairs Facility, Technology replaces Facility.
Rule10: Under the condition that Technology replaces Facility, then if Facility is reactivated, it was shut down.
Rule11: If Technology licenses Food, then the Organization does not use Technology.
Rule12: Provided that Technology licenses Facility, the Organization does not use Technology.
Rule13: Whenever Technology patents Food, either Technology licenses Food or Technology licenses Facility.
Rule14: Either Technology patents Food, or Technology patents Facility.
Rule15: If Technology patents Facility, then either Technology licenses Food or Technology licenses Facility.
Rule16: Provided that the Organization funds Food, the Organization develops Facility.
Rule17: Either the Organization funds Food, or the Organization funds Technology.
Rule18: Under the condition that the Organization funds Technology, the Organization develops Technology.
Rule19: Either the Organization funds Facility, or the Organization uses Food.
Rule20: Whenever the Organization uses Food, the Organization is profitable.
Rule21: Provided that it is not the case that the Organization operates Facility implies the Organization maintains Facility, Facility is reactivated.
Rule22: Under the condition that it is not the case that the Organization operates Facility implies the Organization maintains Facility, Facility is not shut down.
Rule23: If it is not the case that the Organization funds Facility implies the Organization is profitable, then the Organization uses Technology.
Rule24: Under the condition that it is not the case that either the Organization uses Facility or the Organization does not use Technology, the Organization operates Facility.
Rule25: Provided that the Organization is not profitable, the Organization does not develop Food.
facts: Fact2: It is not the case that Food operates Facility.
Fact3: The Organization does not develop Facility.
Fact4: The Organization does not use Facility.
